## aforce

```{r, eval=TRUE, include=FALSE}
library(htmltools)
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
div(
  class = "row",
  div(
    class = "col-md-3",
    img(src = "logo.png")
  ),
  div(
    class = "col-md-9",
    "3D Virtual Force Directed Graph in R."
  )
)
```

### Installation

```{r, eval=FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("JohnCoene/aforce")
```

### Example

```{r, eval=TRUE}
library(aforce)

data("some_nodes")
data("some_links")

aForce$
  new()$ # initialise
  nodes(some_nodes, id, val, color)$ # add nodes
  links(some_links, source, target)$ # add edges
  build()$ # build
  embed() # get embed tag
```
